thread.title: Stars and activists unite to say 'Time's Up' at the BAFTAs

title: Stars and activists unite to say 'Time's Up' at the BAFTAs
text:
Stars and activists unite to say 'Time's Up' at the BAFTAs 2:47pm GMT - 01:45 
Celebrities wore black and brought activists to a politically charged BAFTA award ceremony on Sunday night, in order to promote the Time's Up movement against sexual harassment. Jayson Mansaray reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Celebrities wore black and brought activists to a politically charged BAFTA award ceremony on Sunday night, in order to promote the Time's Up movement against sexual harassment.
